temp.txt
implicit none
    integer i,j
    integer, parameter :: nx = 4, ny = 2, nz=3, neq=20
    real(8) x(nx), y(ny),z(nz)
    integer (4), dimension(nx, ny, nz) :: p, pd, bbb
    real(8), parameter :: xmin = 0.0d0, xmax = 3.141592653589793d0
    real(8), parameter :: ymin = 0.0d0, ymax = 3.141592653589793d0 
    real(8) :: dx=(xmax-xmin)/(neq-1), dy=(ymax-ymin)/(neq-1)
    real(8) , dimension(neq):: a1,a2,a3,x1,b1
    integer :: aa(2,3)
    integer :: bb(3,2)
    integer ::  cc(3,3), dd(3), ee(2,2), ff(3), gg(2), v1(4),v2(4)
    aa = reshape([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6], [2, 3])
    bb = reshape([10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60], [3, 2])
    cc = reshape([1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9],[3,3])
    x=[((i-1)*dx,i=1,neq)]
    y=[((j-1)*dy,j=1,neq)]
    bbb=1
    p=bb*2
    pd=bbb*p+bbb
!    pd=[(x[i],i=1,nx),(j=1,ny*nz)]
    print *,sum(bbb),sum(p),sum(p-bbb)
    print *,shape(p)
    print *,"dx=",dx,",dy=",dy
    print *,x
    print *,pd
    print *,matmul(aa,bb)
    print *,cc
    print *,matmul(cc,bb)
    print *, dot_product(x,x)
!-------------------------------------Tridiag section
    a1=1.0/dx
    a2=-2/dx**2
    a3=1.0/dx
    b1=sin(x)
    call solve_tridiag(a1,a2,a3,b1,x1)
end program array1
! 0.15842337429320230        8.2421618074276723E-018   1.1516040259945637       0.99318065170136138
